Token.Abstract: The TKCalendarDataSource protocol is adopted by an object that mediates the application's data model for a TKCalendar object. The data source provides the calendar object with events.
Returns an array with events for specific date.

Parameter.Name: calendar
Parameter.Abstract: The calendar instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: The date for which to retrieve events.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing instances of objects adopting the TKCalendarEventProtocol protocol.

Token.Abstract: Asks the data source for an array of objects adopting the TKCalendarEventProtocol protocol with a callback.

Parameter.Name: calendar
Parameter.Abstract: The calendar instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: startDate
Parameter.Abstract: The start date for which to retrieve events.

Parameter.Name: endDate
Parameter.Abstract: The end date for wihich to retrieve events.

Parameter.Name: eventsCallback
Parameter.Abstract: The callback block that should be called after retrieving all events for the specified period.
